overview: Is it possible for someone to be in love with several different people at the same time, and carry on a relationship with them all? Find out in this exploration of a new kind of love affair, Polyamory, where several people carry on intimate relationships in a web of sex and love. Aidra draws Mick into her polyamorous web of lovers. Marcus rekindles his love for Mia. Kenna expands her lesbian relationship to include a man, while Alexa, Kenna's lover, discusses the possibilities of multiple lovers with one of her employees, leading her to expand her intimate horizons.
title: Polyamory 3
